name: BestCarSounds
0:
”Alexa, open Best Car Sounds”
”How does a Ford G T?”
”Alexa, open Best Car Sounds and play a random car sound”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best car sounds
des:
Breathtaking car sounds

With over 120 impressive car sounds, our Alexa Skill "Best Car Sounds" offers one of the best collections of car sounds on the net. We have integrated all known vehicles. Like the sound of an Aston Martin DBS, the sound of a BMW M4 or the sound of a Ferrari Enzo.
We have spared no effort to put together the best and most varied car sounds for you. 

And this is how "Best Car Sounds" works

The best car sounds were divided into two categories: 

1.) Car sounds from starting the engine
2.) Car sounds from accelerate

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Example #1:

For example, if you want to listen to the start-up sound of an Aston Martin DBS, just say:

"Alexa, open best car sounds and start a Aston Martin DBS."

... and our Alexa Skill will play the sound of a engine start from an Aston Martin DBS!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Example #2:

However, if you want to know what an Aston Martin DBS sounds like when accelerating, just say:

"Alexa, open best car sounds and play the sound of an Aston Martin DBS."

... and now the impressive sound of an Aston Martin DBS is played.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Example #3:

Play a random car sound

Of course you can also play a random car sound in our Alexa skill "Best Car Sounds" and let it surprise you.

Just say so:

"Alexa, open best car sounds and play me a random car sound."

... and a first class car sound is played, which will amaze you.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Here is a list of car sounds that we have integrated:
